reviewText: This is my all time favorite movie. I've tried to find it on DVD with no luck. It is a wonderful movie about the human spirit and how one never knows how our actions and care affects those lives that we come in contact with. I can't say enough good about this movie.
Title: Grace & Glorie VHS

reviewText: gena is my fave and this story is sweet and another heart warmer.  she has so much talent she can play any kind of role but to me she is at her best in these types of movies.  she seems as dear in real life as she is on screen.  seen on tv and added to my DVD collection.  go gena!

Title: Grace & Glorie VHS

reviewText: I'm a 35 year old man and this movie was awesome. It was funny and deep. My girlfriend asked if I wanted to watch a chick flick with her and since I always force her to watch whatever violent or disturbed movie I want to see, I figured that it would be cool to watch this movie with her. I love all types of movies, so I was excited to see what this was all about. At first I was teasing about the movie, as guys often do when watching a chicky flicky. But soon I realized that this is a very good movie. The story is about a lady who is dying and another lady who is going through some changes herself. They form a bond. The movie isn't depressing as you might think it would be. It's very funny and it moves quickly. This is a high quality movie and I enjoyed it. Don't be afraid to watch this with your chick. If you do she may watch Season 3 of Oz with you... and that is asking A LOT of any woman!
Title: Grace & Glorie VHS

reviewText: ACTING WAS GREAT, LOVED THE STORY, YOU WILL ENJOY THIS HALLMARK MOVIEi HAVE SEE THESE LADIES IN OTHER FILMS AND THEY WERE GOOD
Title: Grace & Glorie VHS

reviewText: A truly inspiring movie about life,friendship,and death.A wonderful movie.Watch it with your loved ones.Appreciate life.
Title: Grace & Glorie VHS

reviewText: This is my favorite of Hallmark films. It is a great story of two women and the lives they have lived and are living. It is a heart-felt drama that will leave you wanting more of the story. Get the tissue out! I can recommend this movie for the whole family. It does have a couple of intense scenes though.
Title: Grace & Glorie VHS
